amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding the urgent need for legislation to ensure the long term viability of the Social Security program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 274 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 274 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Graham SC. (consideration: CR S3931, S3935-3948; text: CR S3931) To express the sense of the Senate regarding the urgent need for legislation to ensure the long term viability of the Social Security program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 274 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Graham SC.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 274 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
